languages.text: "Приятно видеть, что воспитал достойную смену. Иокаста, пожестче с ними!"
"I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"
languages.original_text: "Приятно видеть, что воспитал достойную смену. Иокаста, пожестче с ними!"

traits.locale_text: "I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not be afraid to go hard on them, Jocasta!"
"I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not be afraid to go hard on them, Jocasta!"
"I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"
"I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"
"I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"
"I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"

languages.text: «Me enorgullece ver que he preparado a una sucesora digna. ¡Haz que se dejen la piel, Jocasta!».
languages.original_text: "I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"

traits.locale_text: «Me enorgullece ver que he preparado a una sucesora digna. ¡Haz que se dejen la piel, Jocasta!».

languages.text: 「立派な後継者を育てられたことを誇りに思う。ジョカスタよ、躊躇することなく、厳しく指導するように！」
languages.original_text: "I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"

traits.locale_text: 「立派な後継者を育てられたことを誇りに思う。ジョカスタよ、躊躇することなく、厳しく指導するように！」

languages.text: “看来我培养出了一位合格的继任者，我很自豪。别犹豫，对他们下手狠点，约卡斯塔！”
languages.original_text: "I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"

traits.locale_text: “看来我培养出了一位合格的继任者，我很自豪。别犹豫，对他们下手狠点，约卡斯塔！”

languages.text: "Ich bin stolz, dass ich bereits eine würdige Nachfolgerin herangezogen habe. Zögert nicht, streng zu ihnen zu sein, Jocasta!"
languages.original_text: "I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin stolz, dass ich bereits eine würdige Nachfolgerin herangezogen habe. Zögert nicht, streng zu ihnen zu sein, Jocasta!"

languages.text: « Content de voir que j'ai élevé une héritière digne de ce nom. Ne faites preuve d'aucune pitié, Jocasta ! »
languages.original_text: "I am proud to see that I have raised a worthy successor. Do not hesitate to go hard on them, Jocasta!"

traits.locale_text: « Content de voir que j'ai élevé une héritière digne de ce nom. Ne faites preuve d'aucune pitié, Jocasta ! »

string_traits.trait: Встраивание генокрадов и офицеров в мейнсюжет 2
